name: Notion Todoist Integration
description:
Notion white space reduced.
Embedded Todoist frames formatted for better Notion integration.
additional_info:
Steps to use:
1.Paste this style into stylus chrome extension and apply style to URL of the domain todoist.com and notion.so
2.In Stylus Options/ advanced options/ enable Expose "iframes via HTML[stylus-iframe]" 

If you want to embed any todoist page other than default start page use this link:
https://toolsontech.com/todoistfornotion.php
